price: Lalle ne Muna sani cewa haƙĩƙa, abin da suke faɗa yana ɓãta maka rai. To, lalle ne su, bã su ƙaryata ka (a cikin zukatansu) kuma amma azzãlumai da ãyõyin Allah suke musu.
arabic: قَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحۡزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِي يَقُولُونَۖ فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
